question: Which Deputy Governor of the Reserve Bank of India (RBI) would be in charge of the Department of Regulation?
explanation:
The newly appointed Deputy Governor of Reserve Bank of India (RBI) M Rajeshwar Rao would be in charge of Department of Regulation, Department of Communication, Enforcement Department, Inspection Department, Legal Department and Risk Monitoring Department.
Amid the reshuffling of the portfolios, he has been allotted the portfolios that were erstwhile handled by his predecessor N S Vishwanathan.
